description: Red satin bikini briefs with minimal design

core:description.text: Sleek red bikini briefs crafted from silky satin fabric with a lustrous finish. The minimalist design features a narrow elastic waistband and elasticized leg openings that provide a secure, comfortable fit. Clean lines and minimal seaming create a smooth silhouette beneath clothing, while the luxurious satin material feels soft against the skin. No visible branding or embellishments interrupt the simple, elegant design.
